mapper.sql: LCId, Year, Place, LaCode, LaName, LaGdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_largegdp where year = #{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_largegdp
LCId,
Year,
Place,
LaCode,
LaName,
LaGdp,
#{lcid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lagdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_largegdp
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LaGdp = #{lagdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where LCId = #{lcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_largegdp set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaCode = #{lacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaName = #{laname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LaGdp = #{lagdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where LCId = #{lcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
